Interface SpatialEnvironment2D<A extends SpatialAgent<A,?,?,?>,Z extends Space2D<A,?>>

    • Method Detail

      • findNeighbours

        java.lang.Iterable<A> findNeighbours(A agent,
                                     double distance)
        Find all neighbours of agent within the given distance
        Parameters:
        agent - The focal agent
        distance - The maximum allowed distance of an agent to count as a neighbour
        Returns:
        all neighbours of agent within the given distance

      • distance

        double distance(A agent,
                double degrees)
        Measure the distance from given agent to the first obstacle in the given direction (in degrees [0, 360))
        Parameters:
        agent - the agent which serves as the origin of the distance measure
        degrees - the angle in which direction the distance will be measured
        Returns:
        the distance from agent to the next object in this simulations space

      • removeAgent

        void removeAgent(A agent)
        Remove agent from this Simulation
        Parameters:
        agent - the Agent to be removed from this Simulation
